description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Chicken Thighs With Almonds & Couscous recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Mandarin,Seafood free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free,Father's Day
name: Moroccan Chicken Thighs With Almonds & Couscous Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 chicken thigh cutlets, skin on, fat trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking pan with baking paper. Combine 1 tbs oil, chilli sauce and seasoning in a bowl. Add chicken and turn to coat. Place into pan. Drizzle with 2 tsp oil. Bake for 15 minutes.
Peel 2 mandarins and slice. Add to pan with carrot, onion and radish. Drizzle with remaining oil. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and cooked through.

Meanwhile, juice remaining mandarin. Place couscous in a large heatproof bowl. Add mandarin juice and 3/4 cup boiling water. Cover and stand for 5 minutes. Stir with a fork to separate grains. Season.
To serve, combine couscous and vegetables in a serving bowl, top with chicken and garnish with reserved radish leaves, mint and almonds.
